tablets.subtitle: Turn Your Blog Into an Amazing Tablet Web Application

features.title:
MONETIZE Your Mobile & Tablet
Web Application

list.text: Increase social interactions between your readers by giving them the possibility to like, share, tweet & comment directly from within your app.
Integrate with your favorite Ad Network & Social Micropayments.
All the money goes directly in your pockets; there are no shared revenue constraints.
